email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for reaching out. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for your route. The vessel has a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is 25-30 September, and the freight rate is $25/MT CIF. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Thompson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Emily,

We can adjust the freight rate to $23/MT. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day pro rata, and the loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Michael Thompson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Michael,

$23/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the details and send the recap.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 75,000MT
- Load Port: Richards Bay
- Discharge Port: Rotterdam
- Freight Rate: $23/MT CIF
- Laycan: 25-30 September
- Demurrage: $15,000/day pro rata

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Michael Thompson
